item.title: Manage PKI using OpenSSL
item.description: For better display results you can also have a look at the Manage a PKI using OpenSSL. In the previous X.509 related post I’ve had a look at the internals of a X.509 certficate. This time I want to setup my own PKI using some open source software. This post is a preparation for setting up a VPN using OpenVPN. Before implementing the PKI let’s have a look what a PKI should definitely include (make sure you have a look at the Wikipedia entry):
